rules.name: myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 and 2 and 5 and 6 and 8 ) and ((3 or 4) or (4 and 7)))
rules.label: Technical Feasibility Needs Review

rules.name: myRule_12
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 7 and 8) or (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 6 and 7 and 8)
rules.label: Voice Solution Technical Feasibility Approved

rules.name: myRule_15
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 7 and 8) or (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 6 and 7 and 8)
rules.label: Pre-Sales Solution Technical Feasibility ApprovedPre

rules.name: myRule_22
rules.conditionLogic: (12 and (1 and 2 and 5 and 7 and 8) or (1 and 3 and 5 and 7 and 8) or (1 and 2 and 4 and 6 and 9 and 10 and 11) or (1 and 3 and 4 and 6 and 9 and 10 and 11) or (1 and 2 and 4 and 13) or (1 and 3 and 4 and 13))
rules.label: If no other Approvals Required

rules.name: myRule_4
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 7 and 8 and 9 and 10) or (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 6 and 7 and 8 and 9 and 10)
rules.label: Voice Solution Needs Review

rules.name: myRule_8
rules.conditionLogic: (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 7 and 8 and 9 and 10 and 11) or (1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 6 and 7 and 8 and 9 and 10 and 11)
rules.label: Pre-Sales Needs Review
